titles.title: A resolution expressing support for designation of 2011 as "World Veterinary Year" to bring attention to and show appreciation for the veterinary profession on its 250th anniversary.

action.text: Referred to the Committee on the Judiciary.
Senate Committee on the Judiciary discharged by Unanimous Consent.
Measure laid before Senate by unanimous consent.

vote.text: Resolution agreed to in Senate with an amendment and with a preamble by Unanimous Consent.

bill.summary: 9/23/2010--Passed Senate amended. Expresses support for: (1) the designation of 2011 as World Veterinary Year; and (2) such Year's goals and ideals of bringing attention to and expressing appreciation for the veterinary profession's contributions to animal health, public health, animal welfare, and food safety.
